fields.label: translate:: Title
fields.description: translate:: This title will be displayed above the introduction text.

fields.label: translate:: Introduction text
fields.description: translate:: This text will be displayed before the quiz starts.

fields.label: translate:: Background image
fields.description: translate:: An optional background image for the introduction.

semantics.label: translate:: Background image
semantics.description: translate:: An optional background image for the Question set.

semantics.label: translate:: Progress indicator
semantics.description: translate:: Question set progress indicator style.

semantics.label: translate:: Pass percentage
semantics.description: translate:: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Progress text
fields.description: translate:: Text used if textual progress is selected.

fields.label: translate:: Label for jumping to a certain question
fields.description: translate:: You must use the placeholder '%d' instead of the question number, and %total instead of total amount of questions.

fields.label: translate:: Readspeaker progress
fields.description: translate:: May use @current and @total question variables

semantics.label: translate:: Disable backwards navigation
semantics.description: translate:: This option will only allow you to move forward in Question Set

semantics.label: translate:: Randomize questions
semantics.description: translate:: Enable to randomize the order of questions on display.

semantics.label: translate:: Number of questions to be shown:
semantics.description: translate:: Create a randomized batch of questions from the total.

fields.label: translate:: No results message
fields.description: translate:: Text displayed on end page when "Display results" is disabled

fields.label: translate:: Feedback heading
fields.description: translate:: This heading will be displayed at the end of the quiz when the user has answered all questions.

fields.label: translate:: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: translate:: Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: translate:: Feedback for defined score range
translate:: Quiz passed greeting
fields.description: translate:: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Passed comment
fields.description: translate:: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Quiz failed title
fields.description: translate:: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Failed comment
fields.description: translate:: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Solution button label
fields.description: translate:: Text for the solution button.

fields.label: translate:: Retry button label
fields.description: translate:: Text for the retry button.

fields.label: translate:: Display video before quiz results
translate:: Passed video
fields.description: translate:: This video will be played if the user successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Fail video
fields.description: translate:: This video will be played if the user fails the quiz.

semantics.label: translate:: Settings for "Show solution" and "Retry" buttons

fields.label: translate:: Show "Check" buttons
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Check" button will be shown for all questions.

fields.label: translate:: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: translate:: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
